SELECT t3.video_id, t3.goods_id, t3.like_num, t3.usermd5, t3.shop_name, t3.address, t3.dividend, t3.videomd5, t3.videoimglist, IFNULL((tvur.user_id),0)AS isUpvote FROM
(SELECT t1.u_id AS video_id, t1.goods_id, IFNULL(t1.like_num, 0) AS like_num, t1.usermd5, t1.shop_name, t1.address, IFNULL( t1.dividend, 0) AS dividend, t1.videomd5, t2.videoimglist FROM
(SELECT tv.u_id , tvu.goods_id , tv.like_num, sr.path AS userImgUrl, sr.md5 AS usermd5, ts.shop_name, ts.address, tgb.dividend, srv.path AS videopath, srv.md5 AS videomd5 FROM t_video tv LEFT JOIN t_video_user tvu ON tvu.video_id= tv.u_id AND tv.`status`=3 LEFT JOIN t_user_info tui ON tvu.user_id= tui.user_id LEFT JOIN t_metadata_rel tmr ON tmr.record_id=tui.avatar_id LEFT JOIN s_resources sr ON tmr.data_id= sr.u_id LEFT JOIN t_metadata_rel tmrv ON tmrv.record_id=tv.video_url AND tmrv.type = 1 LEFT JOIN s_resources srv ON tmrv.data_id= srv.u_id LEFT JOIN t_shop ts ON ts.u_id = tvu.shop_id LEFT JOIN t_goods_percentage tgp ON tgp.goods_id = tvu.goods_id LEFT JOIN t_goods_brokerage tgb ON tgp.u_id= tgb.percentage_id) t1,
( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(t.md5) AS videoimglist, t.video_id FROM
( SELECT sr.md5, tv.u_id AS video_id FROM t_video tv LEFT JOIN t_metadata_rel tmr ON tv.video_url=tmr.record_id LEFT JOIN s_resources sr ON tmr.data_id=sr.u_id AND tmr.data_type=4 ) t GROUP BY t.video_id) t2 WHERE t1.u_id=t2.video_id) t3 LEFT JOIN t_video_upvote_record tvur ON tvur.video_id=t3.video_id AND tvur.user_id=#{userId} LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(u_id) FROM t_video where status = 3

SELECT t3.NAME, t6.userurl AS userimgurl,t3.upload_time AS post_time , t3.videourl, t4.videoimglist, t3.u_id AS videoId FROM
(SELECT tui.NAME, tui.avatar_id, t1.upload_time, sr.md5 AS videourl,t1.u_id FROM
(SELECT tv.u_id, tv.video_url, tvu.user_id, tv.upload_time FROM t_video_user tvu, t_video tv WHERE tvu.video_id=tv.u_id AND tvu.goods_id=#{userId} AND tv.`status` =3) t1 LEFT JOIN t_user_info tui ON tui.user_id= t1.user_id LEFT JOIN t_metadata_rel tmr ON tmr.record_id=t1.video_url AND tmr.type=1 LEFT JOIN s_resources sr ON tmr.data_id= sr.u_id) t3,
(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(sr.md5) AS videoimglist, tmr.record_id, t2.u_id AS video_id FROM (SELECT tv.u_id, tv.video_url, tvu.user_id, tv.upload_time FROM t_video_user tvu, t_video tv WHERE tvu.video_id=tv.u_id AND tvu.goods_id=#{userId} AND tv.`status` =3) t2 LEFT JOIN t_metadata_rel tmr ON tmr.record_id=t2.video_url AND tmr.data_type=4 LEFT JOIN s_resources sr ON tmr.data_id= sr.u_id GROUP BY tmr.record_id) t4,
(SELECT sr.md5 AS userurl, t5.u_id FROM (SELECT tv.u_id, tv.video_url, tvu.user_id, tv.upload_time FROM t_video_user tvu, t_video tv WHERE tvu.video_id=tv.u_id AND tvu.goods_id=#{userId} AND tv.`status` =3) t5 LEFT JOIN t_user_info tui ON tui.user_id = t5.user_id LEFT JOIN t_metadata_rel tmr ON tmr.record_id= tui.avatar_id AND tmr.type=0 LEFT JOIN s_resources sr ON sr.u_id=tmr.data_id) t6 WHERE t3.u_id=t4.video_id AND t3.u_id=t6.u_id LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT( tv.u_id) AS videosum FROM t_video_user tvu, t_video tv WHERE tvu.video_id=tv.u_id AND tv.status =3 AND tvu.goods_id=#{goodsId}

SELECT t2.shop_name, t2.`status`, t2.video_id, t2.goods_id, t2.trydate, t2.gmt_create, t3.videourl, t5.videoimglist FROM
(SELECT shop_name, t.video_id, t.goods_id, t.trydate, t.gmt_create, t.`status` FROM t_shop ts, (SELECT tvu.video_id , tv.`status`, tvu.shop_id,tvu.goods_id, tvu.gmt_create, DATE_FORMAT(tvu.gmt_create,'%Y-%m-%d') AS trydate FROM t_video_user tvu , t_video tv WHERE tv.u_id =tvu.video_id AND tv.`status` != 99 AND tvu.user_id=#{userId} GROUP BY trydate,tvu.video_id ORDER BY trydate DESC) t WHERE ts.u_id=t.shop_id) t2,
(SELECT sr.md5 AS videourl, t1.video_id FROM
(SELECT tvu.video_id, tv.video_url, DATE_FORMAT(tvu.gmt_create,'%Y-%m-%d') AS trydate FROM t_video_user tvu , t_video tv WHERE tv.u_id =tvu.video_id AND tv.`status` != 99 AND tvu.user_id=#{userId} GROUP BY trydate,tvu.video_id ORDER BY trydate DESC) t1 LEFT JOIN t_metadata_rel tmr ON t1.video_url=tmr.record_id AND tmr.type=1 LEFT JOIN s_resources sr ON tmr.data_id=sr.u_id) t3,
(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(sr.md5) AS videoimglist, t4.video_id FROM
(SELECT tvu.video_id, tv.video_url, DATE_FORMAT(tvu.gmt_create,'%Y-%m-%d') AS trydate FROM t_video_user tvu , t_video tv WHERE tv.u_id =tvu.video_id AND tv.`status` != 99 AND tvu.user_id=#{userId} GROUP BY trydate,tvu.video_id ORDER BY trydate DESC) t4 LEFT JOIN t_metadata_rel tmr ON t4.video_url=tmr.record_id AND tmr.data_type=4 LEFT JOIN s_resources sr ON tmr.data_id=sr.u_id GROUP BY t4.video_id) t5
WHERE t2.video_id= t3.video_id AND t5.video_id=t2.video_id ORDER BY t2.trydate DESC LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(tv.u_id) AS uservideocount FROM t_video_user tvu, t_video tv WHERE tv.u_id =tvu.video_id AND tv.status != 99 AND tvu.user_id=#{userId}

SELECT t5.video_id, t5.goods_id, t5.like_num,t5.usermd5, t5.shop_name, t5.address, t5.dividend, t5.videomd5,t5.videoimglist, IFNULL((tvur.user_id),0)AS isUpvote FROM ( SELECT t4.u_id AS video_id, t4.goods_id, t4.like_num, t4.usermd5, t4.shop_name, t4.address, t4.dividend, t4.videomd5, t4.videoimglist FROM ( SELECT tv.u_id FROM t_user_info tui, t_video_user tvu, t_video tv WHERE 1=1 AND tui.user_id= tvu.user_id AND tv.u_id=tvu.video_id AND tv.`status`=3
AND ( tui.age BETWEEN #{minAge} AND #{maxAge} )
AND (tui.height BETWEEN #{minHeight} AND #{maxHeight} )
AND (tui.weight BETWEEN #{minWeight} AND #{maxWeight} )
AND tui.sex=#{sex}
) t3 LEFT JOIN (SELECT t1.u_id, t1.goods_id, IFNULL(t1.like_num, 0) AS like_num, t1.usermd5, t1.shop_name, t1.address, IFNULL( t1.dividend, 0) AS dividend, t1.videomd5, t2.videoimglist FROM
(SELECT tv.u_id, tv.video_url, tvu.goods_id , tv.like_num, sr.path AS userImgUrl, sr.md5 AS usermd5, ts.shop_name, ts.address, tgb.dividend, srv.path AS videopath, srv.md5 AS videomd5 FROM t_video tv LEFT JOIN t_video_user tvu ON tvu.video_id= tv.u_id LEFT JOIN t_user_info tui ON tvu.user_id= tui.user_id LEFT JOIN t_metadata_rel tmr ON tmr.record_id=tui.avatar_id LEFT JOIN s_resources sr ON tmr.data_id= sr.u_id LEFT JOIN t_metadata_rel tmrv ON tmrv.record_id=tv.video_url AND tmrv.type = 1 LEFT JOIN s_resources srv ON tmrv.data_id= srv.u_id LEFT JOIN t_shop ts ON ts.u_id = tvu.shop_id LEFT JOIN t_goods_percentage tgp ON tgp.goods_id = tvu.goods_id LEFT JOIN t_goods_brokerage tgb ON tgp.u_id= tgb.percentage_id) t1,
( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(t.md5) AS videoimglist, t.u_id FROM
( SELECT sr.md5, tv.u_id FROM t_video tv LEFT JOIN t_metadata_rel tmr ON tv.video_url=tmr.record_id LEFT JOIN s_resources sr ON tmr.data_id=sr.u_id AND tmr.data_type=4 ) t GROUP BY t.u_id) t2
WHERE t1.u_id=t2.u_id) t4 ON t3.u_id=t4.u_id) t5
LEFT JOIN t_video_upvote_record tvur ON tvur.video_id=t5.video_id AND tvur.user_id=#{userId} LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(tv.u_id) FROM t_user_info tui, t_video_user tvu, t_video tv WHERE 1=1 AND tui.user_id= tvu.user_id AND tv.u_id=tvu.video_id AND tv.status=3
AND ( tui.age BETWEEN #{minAge} AND #{maxAge} )
AND (tui.height BETWEEN #{minHeight} AND #{maxHeight} )
AND (tui.weight BETWEEN #{minWeight} AND #{maxWeight} )
AND tui.sex=#{sex}

SELECT t2.shop_name, t2.video_id, t2.goods_id, t2.trydate, t2.gmt_create, t3.videourl, t5.videoimglist FROM (SELECT shop_name, t.video_id, t.goods_id, t.trydate, t.gmt_create FROM t_shop ts, ( SELECT tvu.video_id ,tvu.shop_id,tvu.goods_id, tvu.gmt_create, DATE_FORMAT(tvu.gmt_create,'%Y-%m-%d') AS trydate FROM t_video_user tvu, t_video tv WHERE tvu.user_id=#{userId} AND tvu.video_id=tv.u_id AND tv.`status`=3 GROUP BY trydate,tvu.video_id ORDER BY trydate DESC ) t WHERE ts.u_id=t.shop_id) t2, (SELECT sr.md5 AS videourl, t1.video_id FROM (SELECT tvu.video_id, tv.video_url, DATE_FORMAT(tvu.gmt_create,'%Y-%m-%d') AS trydate FROM t_video_user tvu , t_video tv WHERE tvu.user_id=#{userId} AND tvu.video_id=tv.u_id AND tv.`status`=3 GROUP BY trydate,tvu.video_id ORDER BY trydate DESC) t1 LEFT JOIN t_metadata_rel tmr ON t1.video_url=tmr.record_id AND tmr.type=1 LEFT JOIN s_resources sr ON tmr.data_id=sr.u_id) t3, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(sr.md5) AS videoimglist, t4.video_id FROM (SELECT tvu.video_id, tv.video_url, DATE_FORMAT(tvu.gmt_create,'%Y-%m-%d') AS trydate FROM t_video_user tvu , t_video tv WHERE tvu.user_id=#{userId} AND tvu.video_id=tv.u_id AND tv.`status`=3 GROUP BY trydate,tvu.video_id ORDER BY trydate DESC) t4 LEFT JOIN t_metadata_rel tmr ON t4.video_url=tmr.record_id AND tmr.data_type=4 LEFT JOIN s_resources sr ON tmr.data_id=sr.u_id GROUP BY t4.video_id) t5 WHERE t2.video_id= t3.video_id AND t5.video_id=t2.video_id ORDER BY t2.trydate DESC LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(tv.u_id) AS uservideocount FROM t_video_user tvu , t_video tv WHERE tv.u_id = tvu.video_id AND tv.`status` = 3 AND tvu.user_id =#{userId}
